How do I add images to my content



  • 2010-01-17 17:58:38

    How do I add images to my content

    I recently had ATutor installed and am now trying to create a course. I'm having trouble finding out how to install images into my content pages. I'm uploading my text files as HTML and using the text editor to try to insert my pics. What is the URL that it asks for when I click the Insert Picture icon on the visual editor? I've created an images folder in File Manager and uploaded images to that folder, but the URL to that location doesn't work in the text editor. No error messages are displayed -- just a square with a red X where I want the image to appear. Thank you.


  • 2010-01-18 09:45:41

    Re: How do I add images to my content

    a path to images in the images directory of your file manager would be something like

    images/myimage.gif

    There may be a bug in displaying images in the editor, but they should still appear in the content when saved and viewed.


  • 2010-01-18 13:37:54

    Re: How do I add images to my content

    Thank you, Greg! As usual, I was over-complicating it. To be sure I'm on the right track, I'm using tables layout my pages. Is that correct? Thanks!

    Janet
